languages.text: "Мое имя — Кубис Дельфим. Некогда я носил звание {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g} Кьявы Гамма, но я отверг его — как и прочие путы, мешающие прогрессу. Моя вера была полна изъянов и вела наивных глупцов Культа Механикус во мрак неведения. Отныне я — владыка этого мира и служу истинным богам. Ты на их территории и не входишь в сонм их слуг — следовательно, тебя необходимо подвергнуть утилизации".

traits.locale_text: "Мое имя — Кубис Дельфим. Некогда я носил звание Фабрикатора Кьява Гамма, но я отверг его — как и прочие путы, мешающие прогрессу. Моя вера была полна изъянов и вела наивных глупцов Культа Механикус во мрак неведения. Посланник истинных богов открыл мне путь к свободе, которой достойны лишь зрячие".

languages.text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."
languages.original_text: "Мое имя — Кубис Дельфим. Некогда я носил звание {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g} Кьявы Гамма, но я отверг его — как и прочие путы, мешающие прогрессу. Моя вера была полна изъянов и вела наивных глупцов Культа Механикус во мрак неведения. Отныне я — владыка этого мира и служу истинным богам. Ты на их территории и не входишь в сонм их слуг — следовательно, тебя необходимо подвергнуть утилизации".

traits.locale_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of Fabricator of the Kiava Gamma manufactorum, but I rejected it — along with other bindings that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you are not of the legion of their servants — therefore, you are subject to immediate disposal."

languages.text: “我的名字叫库比斯·德尔菲姆。我曾是基亚瓦伽马星{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}，但我已经拒绝了这个头衔，拒绝了那些阻碍进步的枷锁。我的信仰曾一度是有缺陷的，我把机械修会那些天真愚昧之人带入了无知的黑暗之中。如今，我是这个世界的主人，为真神服务。你践踏了真神的领土，你也并不是真神军团的仆人。因此，你必须立刻接受处置。”
languages.original_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."

traits.locale_text: “我的名字叫库比斯·德尔菲姆。我曾是基亚瓦伽马星{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}，但我已经拒绝了这个头衔，拒绝了那些阻碍进步的枷锁。我的信仰曾一度是有缺陷的，我把机械修会那些天真愚昧之人带入了无知的黑暗之中。如今，我是这个世界的主人，为真神服务。你践踏了真神的领土，你也并不是真神军团的仆人。因此，你必须立刻接受处置。”

languages.text: «Me llamo Cubis Delphim. En su día ocupé el cargo de {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} de Kiava Gamma, pero lo rechacé junto con las otras ligaduras que impedían el progreso. Mi fe era defectuosa y llevaba a los necios del Culto Mechanicus a la oscuridad de la ignorancia. Ahora soy el señor de este mundo y sirvo a los verdaderos dioses. Está en su territorio sin pertenecer a la legión de sus sirvientes, por lo que debe ser eliminad{mf|o|a} de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."

traits.locale_text: «Me llamo Cubis Delphim. En su día ocupé el cargo de {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} de Kiava Gamma, pero lo rechacé junto con las otras ligaduras que impedían el progreso. Mi fe era defectuosa y llevaba a los necios del Culto Mechanicus a la oscuridad de la ignorancia. Ahora soy el señor de este mundo y sirvo a los verdaderos dioses. Está en su territorio sin pertenecer a la legión de sus sirvientes, por lo que debe ser eliminad{mf|o|a} de inmediato».

languages.text: 「私の名前はキュビス・デルフィム。かつてキアヴァ・ガンマ{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}の称号を持っていたが、進歩を妨げるその他の束縛とともに、称号も拒否した。かつて私の信仰には欠陥があり、機械教団の純粋で愚かな者達を無知の闇に導いてしまった。今、私はこの惑星の主であり、真の神に仕えている。お前はその領土を踏み荒らし、神の兵団の使いでもない―したがって、お前は即刻処分の対象となる」
languages.original_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."

traits.locale_text: 「私の名前はキュビス・デルフィム。かつてキアヴァ・ガンマ{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}の称号を持っていたが、進歩を妨げるその他の束縛とともに、称号も拒否した。かつて私の信仰には欠陥があり、機械教団の純粋で愚かな者達を無知の闇に導いてしまった。今、私はこの惑星の主であり、真の神に仕えている。お前はその領土を踏み荒らし、神の兵団の使いでもない―したがって、お前は即刻処分の対象となる」

languages.text: "Mein Name ist Cubis Delphim. Ich trug einst den Titel {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g} von Kiava Gamma, habe ihn aber abgelegt – zusammen mit den anderen Fesseln, die dem Fortschritt im Weg standen. Früher war mein Glaube fehlerhaft und führte naive Narren aus dem Kult Mechanicus in die Dunkelheit der Unwissenheit. Heute bin ich der Herr dieser Welt und diene den wahren Göttern. Ihr habt ihr Territorium betreten und gehört nicht zur Legion ihrer Diener – Ihr müsst darum umgehend entsorgt werden."
languages.original_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Name ist Cubis Delphim. Ich trug einst den Titel {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g} von Kiava Gamma, habe ihn aber abgelegt – zusammen mit den anderen Fesseln, die dem Fortschritt im Weg standen. Früher war mein Glaube fehlerhaft und führte naive Narren aus dem Kult Mechanicus in die Dunkelheit der Unwissenheit. Heute bin ich der Herr dieser Welt und diene den wahren Göttern. Ihr habt ihr Territorium betreten und gehört nicht zur Legion ihrer Diener – Ihr müsst darum umgehend entsorgt werden."

languages.text: « Je me nomme Cubis Delphim. J'étais autrefois le {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} de Kiava Gamma, mais j'ai renoncé à ce titre ainsi qu'aux autres entraves au progrès. Ma foi erronée a guidé les âmes trop naïves du Culte Mechanicus dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Je règne désormais sur ce monde pour la plus grande gloire des vrais dieux. Fouler leur territoire sans appartenir aux serviteurs de leur légion vous condamne à une élimination immédiate. »
languages.original_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."

traits.locale_text: « Je me nomme Cubis Delphim. J'étais autrefois le {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} de Kiava Gamma, mais j'ai renoncé à ce titre ainsi qu'aux autres entraves au progrès. Ma foi erronée a guidé les âmes trop naïves du Culte Mechanicus dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Je règne désormais sur ce monde pour la plus grande gloire des vrais dieux. Fouler leur territoire sans appartenir aux serviteurs de leur légion vous condamne à une élimination immédiate. »

languages.text: "Adım Cubis Delphim. Bir zamanlar ünvanım Kiava Gama {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorumunun{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ü{/g} idi. Lakin ilerlemeye engel olan diğer prangalarla birlikte onu da reddettim. Bir zamanlar inancım kusurluydu, Cult Mechanicus'taki naif ahmakları cehaletin karanlığına sürüklüyordum. Artık bu dünyanın efendisiyim ve gerçek tanrılara hizmet ediyorum. Onların topraklarında geziyor ama lejyonları arasında addedilmiyorsun, bu nedenle derhâl imha edilmelisin."
languages.original_text: "My name is Cubis Delphim. I once held the title of {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} of the Kiava Gamma {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}, but I rejected it — along with the other fetters that hindered progress. Once, my faith was flawed and led naive fools from the Cult Mechanicus into the darkness of ignorance. Now I am this world's master, and serve the true gods. You tread upon their territory, and you do not number among their legion servants — therefore, you must be subject to immediate disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Adım Cubis Delphim. Bir zamanlar ünvanım Kiava Gama {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorum{/g}unun {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}'ü idi lakin ilerlemeyi engelleyen diğer prangalarla birlikte onu da reddettim. Bir zamanlar inancım kusurluydu, Cult Mechanicus'taki naif ahmakları cehaletin karanlığına sürüklüyordum. Artık bu dünyanın efendisiyim ve gerçek tanrılara hizmet ediyorum. Onların topraklarında geziyor ama lejyonları arasında addedilmiyorsun, bu nedenle derhâl imha edilmelisin."
